name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Staff of Healing
description: A magical staff that radiates healing energy.
looks: The staff is made of polished oak and is adorned with intricate carvings of healing symbols. It emits a soft golden glow.

special_effects.healing_aura: Emits an aura of healing energy that heals nearby allies over time.

name: Spellbook of Fireball
description: A spellbook containing the knowledge of the powerful Fireball spell.
looks: The spellbook has a leather cover with intricate engravings of flames. The pages are made of ancient parchment and are filled with magical symbols and incantations.

special_effects.fire_mastery: Increases the damage of fire spells by 20%.

name: Magic Amulet
description: A mystical amulet infused with ancient magical energies.
looks: The amulet has a small, intricately carved pendant that glows with a soft, ethereal light. It is attached to a delicate, silver chain.

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Staff of Healing
description: A magical staff that harnesses the power of healing
looks: The staff is made of polished wood and adorned with intricate carvings. It glows with a soft blue light.

special_effects.healing_touch: Increases effectiveness of healing spells by 20%

name: Amulet of Wisdom
description: A mystical amulet that enhances the wearer's wisdom and perception.
looks: The amulet is made of pure silver and is adorned with a small, glowing crystal at its center. The crystal changes color depending on the wearer's mood.

special_effects.enhanced_perception: Increases perception and the ability to notice hidden objects or clues.
special_effects.wise_mind: Enhances wisdom and the ability to make wise decisions.

name: Ring of Strength
description: A magical ring that enhances the wearer's strength.
looks: The ring is made of shining silver and has a small diamond embedded in the center. It glows faintly with a blue aura.

special_effects.enhanced_strength: Increases the wearer's strength by 3 points.
